item.title: CVE-2024-22304|2024-01-31T12:15:37.483Z -- Borbis Media -- FreshMail For WordPress
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Borbis Media FreshMail For WordPress.This issue affects FreshMail For WordPress: from n/a through 2.3.2.
